"Junghuhn O", Java, Indonesia, Asia; la partie sudouest du plateau de Bandong; dem Vereinigingspunkte des Tji Burial und des Tji Tangkil; Gunung Sela; Cilanang Gap. Contains Upper Miocene to Pliocene. In some cases a more specific age (e.g. Pliocene) has been quoted for this locality in literature or on the object label.
